00034 // will create a squad each n hours (12 for example). Should divide 24 without remainder
00035 //#define CREATE_EACH_N_HOURS 12

00037 // more these values - less the chances
00038 #define CHANCE_TO_MOVE_A_SQUAD 5
00039 #define CHANCE_TO_MOVE_AN_UNFULL_SQUAD 40
00040 
00041 //#define DIV_OF_ORIGINAL_MILITIA 2

00071 //Counts the number of live mercs in any given sector.
00072 BOOLEAN PlayerMercsInSector_MSE( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY, BOOLEAN fDontConsiderNextSector )
00073 {
00074       GROUP *pGroup;
00075       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
00076       UINT8 ubNumMercs = 0;
00077       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00078       while( pGroup )
00079       {
00080             if( pGroup->fPlayer )// && !pGroup->fBetweenSectors)
00081             { 
00082                   if ( ( pGroup->ubSectorX == ubSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == ubSectorY && pGroup->ubSectorZ == 0 ) ||
00083                          ( !fDontConsiderNextSector && ( pGroup->ubNextX == ubSectorX && pGroup->ubNextY == ubSectorY && pGroup->ubSectorZ == 0 ) ) )
00084                   {
00085                         //we have a group, make sure that it isn't a group containing only dead members.
00086                         pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
00087                         while( pPlayer )
00088                         {
00089                               // robots count as mercs here, because they can fight, but vehicles don't
00090                               if( ( pPlayer->pSoldier->bLife ) && !( pPlayer->pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
00091                               {
00092                                     ubNumMercs++;
00093                               }
00094                               pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
00095                         }
00096                   }
00097             }
00098             pGroup = pGroup->next;
00099       }
00100       return ubNumMercs;
00101 }

00104 // get any enemy group id in the sector (if no group, will return 0 )
00105 UINT8 GetEnemyGroupIdInSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
00106 {
00107       UINT8 ubRes = 0;
00108       GROUP *curr;
00109       curr = gpGroupList;
00110       while( curr )
00111       {
00112             if( curr->ubSectorX == sMapX && curr->ubSectorY == sMapY && !curr->fPlayer )
00113                   if( !curr->ubGroupID )
00114                         return curr->ubGroupID;
00115                   else 
00116                         ubRes = curr->ubGroupID;
00117             curr = curr->next;
00118       }
00119       return ubRes;
00120 }

00123 // Count all militia in the sector
00124 UINT8 CountMilitia(SECTORINFO *pSectorInfo)
00125 {
00126       return pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[GREEN_MILITIA]+
00127       pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[REGULAR_MILITIA]+
00128       pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ELITE_MILITIA];
00129 }

00131 // Creates militia at destination sector. The type and amount of militia depends on current sector's miltia type and amount
00132 void GenerateMilitiaSquad(INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT16 sTMapX, INT16 sTMapY )
00133 {
00134       SECTORINFO *pSectorInfo = &( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ] );
00135       
00136       StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sTMapX, sTMapY, GREEN_MILITIA, pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ GREEN_MILITIA ] / gGameExternalOptions.guiDivOfOriginalMilitia);
00137       StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sTMapX, sTMapY, REGULAR_MILITIA, pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ REGULAR_MILITIA ] / gGameExternalOptions.guiDivOfOriginalMilitia);
00138       StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sTMapX, sTMapY, ELITE_MILITIA, pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ ELITE_MILITIA ] / gGameExternalOptions.guiDivOfOriginalMilitia);
00139 
00140       pSectorInfo = &( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sTMapX, sTMapY ) ] );
00141 
00142       while( CountMilitia(pSectorInfo) > gGameExternalOptions.guiMaxMilitiaSquadSize )
00143             if(pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[GREEN_MILITIA])--pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[GREEN_MILITIA];else
00144                   if(pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[REGULAR_MILITIA])--pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[REGULAR_MILITIA];else
00145                         if(pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ELITE_MILITIA])--pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ELITE_MILITIA];
00146 
00147 }

00149 // Creates militia at destination sector and removes it from starting sector
00150 void MoveMilitiaSquad(INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT16 sTMapX, INT16 sTMapY, BOOLEAN fAlternativeMax )
00151 {
00152       SECTORINFO *pSectorInfo = &( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ] );
00153       SECTORINFO *pTSectorInfo = &( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sTMapX, sTMapY ) ] );
00154       
00155       StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sTMapX, sTMapY, GREEN_MILITIA, pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ GREEN_MILITIA ] );
00156       StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sTMapX, sTMapY, REGULAR_MILITIA, pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ REGULAR_MILITIA ] );
00157       StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sTMapX, sTMapY, ELITE_MILITIA, pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ ELITE_MILITIA ] );
00158 
00159       StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( sMapX, sMapY, GREEN_MILITIA, pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ GREEN_MILITIA ] );
00160       StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( sMapX, sMapY, REGULAR_MILITIA, pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ REGULAR_MILITIA ] );
00161       StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( sMapX, sMapY, ELITE_MILITIA, pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ ELITE_MILITIA ] );
00162 
00163       while( !fAlternativeMax && CountMilitia(pTSectorInfo) > gGameExternalOptions.guiMaxMilitiaSquadSize ||
00164             fAlternativeMax && CountMilitia(pTSectorInfo) > gGameExternalOptions.guiMaxMilitiaSquadSizeBattle )
00165             if(pTSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[GREEN_MILITIA])
00166             {--pTSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[GREEN_MILITIA];++pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[GREEN_MILITIA];}else
00167             if(pTSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[REGULAR_MILITIA])
00168             {--pTSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[REGULAR_MILITIA];++pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[REGULAR_MILITIA];}else
00169             if(pTSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ELITE_MILITIA])
00170             {--pTSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ELITE_MILITIA];++pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ELITE_MILITIA];}
00171 }
00172 
00173 BOOLEAN MoveOneBestMilitiaMan(INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT16 sTMapX, INT16 sTMapY)
00174 {
00175       SECTORINFO *pSectorInfo = &( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ] );
00176 //    SECTORINFO *pTSectorInfo = &( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sTMapX, sTMapY ) ] );
00177 
00178       if( pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ ELITE_MILITIA ] )
00179       {
00180             StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sTMapX, sTMapY, ELITE_MILITIA, 1 );
00181             StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( sMapX, sMapY, ELITE_MILITIA, 1 );
00182             return TRUE;
00183       }
00184       if( pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ REGULAR_MILITIA ] )
00185       {
00186             StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sTMapX, sTMapY, REGULAR_MILITIA, 1 );
00187             StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( sMapX, sMapY, REGULAR_MILITIA, 1 );
00188             return TRUE;
00189       }
00190       if( pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ GREEN_MILITIA ] )
00191       {
00192             StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sTMapX, sTMapY, GREEN_MILITIA, 1 );
00193             StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( sMapX, sMapY, GREEN_MILITIA, 1 );
00194             return TRUE;
00195       }
00196       return FALSE;
00197 }
00198 
00199 // Generate rating for a direction
00200 UINT16 CountDirectionEnemyRating( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT8 uiDir )
00201 {
00202       DOUBLE ddMinAngle, ddMaxAngle;
00203       DOUBLE ddRes = 0;
00204       DOUBLE pix2 = 3.1415926 * 2; // pi * 2
00205       //UINT16 uiSector = 0;
00206       INT16 sLMX, sLMY;
00207 
00208       switch(uiDir)
00209       {
00210       case DIR_NORTH:
00211             ddMinAngle = -2.3561944; // -135 degrees
00212             ddMaxAngle = -0.7853981; // -45 degrees
00213             break;
00214       case DIR_EAST:
00215             ddMinAngle = -0.7853981; // -45 degrees
00216             ddMaxAngle = 0.7853981; // 45 degrees
00217             break;
00218       case DIR_SOUTH:
00219             ddMinAngle = 0.7853981; // 45 degrees
00220             ddMaxAngle = 2.3561944; // 135 degrees
00221             break;
00222       case DIR_WEST:
00223             ddMinAngle = 2.3561944; // 135 degrees
00224             ddMaxAngle = -2.3561944 + pix2; // 225 degrees(-135)
00225             break;
00226       default:
00227             return 0;
00228       }
00229       
00230       //for( uiSector = 0 ; uiSector < 256 ; ++uiSector )
00231       for( sLMX = 0; sLMX < 16 ; ++sLMX )
00232             for( sLMY = 0; sLMY < 16 ; ++sLMY )
00233       {
00234 //          SECTORINFO *pSectorInfo = &( SectorInfo[ uiSector ] );
00235             UINT8 uiSumOfEnemyTroops = NumEnemiesInSector( sLMX, sLMY );
00236                   //pSectorInfo->ubNumAdmins + pSectorInfo->ubNumTroops + pSectorInfo->ubNumElites;
00237 
00238             // there's an enemy
00239             if( uiSumOfEnemyTroops )
00240             {
00241                   DOUBLE ddAngle;
00242 
00243                   if( sLMX - sMapX == 0 )ddAngle = ( sLMY - sMapY > 0 ) ? 1.57079632 : -1.57079632;
00244                         else ddAngle = atan2( (double)(sLMY - sMapY), (double)(sLMX - sMapX) );
00245 
00246                   if( ddAngle < 0 && uiDir == DIR_WEST )ddAngle += pix2;
00247       
00248                   // is it in a right direction?
00249                   if( ddAngle >= ddMinAngle && ddAngle <= ddMaxAngle )
00250                   {
00251                         DOUBLE ddDistance = sqrt( pow( (double)(sLMY - sMapY), 2 ) + pow( (double)(sLMX - sMapX), 2 ) );
00252 
00253                         ddRes += (DOUBLE)uiSumOfEnemyTroops / pow( ddDistance, 2 );
00254       
00255                   }
00256             }
00257       }
00258 
00259       return (UINT16) ddRes;
00260 }
00261 
00262 UINT16 CountDirectionRating( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT8 uiDir )
00263 {
00264       INT32 iRes = BASE_DIR_PRIORITY + CountDirectionEnemyRating( sMapX, sMapY, uiDir );
00265 
00266       INT16 sDMapX, sDMapY;
00267       INT32 iDiff;
00268 
00269       switch(uiDir)
00270       {
00271       case DIR_NORTH:
00272             sDMapX = sMapX;
00273             sDMapY = sMapY - 1;
00274             break;
00275       case DIR_EAST:
00276             sDMapX = sMapX + 1;
00277             sDMapY = sMapY;
00278             break;
00279       case DIR_SOUTH:
00280             sDMapX = sMapX;
00281             sDMapY = sMapY + 1;
00282             break;
00283       case DIR_WEST:
00284             sDMapX = sMapX - 1;
00285             sDMapY = sMapY;
00286             break;
00287       default:
00288             return iRes;
00289       }
00290 
00291       if( CountAllMilitiaInSector( sDMapX, sDMapY ) &&
00292             (UINT32)( CountAllMilitiaInSector( sDMapX, sDMapY ) + CountAllMilitiaInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) ) <= gGameExternalOptions.guiMaxMilitiaSquadSize )
00293             iRes += DIR_WITH_UNFULL_SQUAD_RATING_BONUS;
00294       
00295       if( NumEnemiesInSector( sDMapX, sDMapY  ) )
00296       {
00297       //    if( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == BLANK_SECTOR )
00298                   iDiff = (INT32)( (FLOAT)iRes * ( (FLOAT)CountAllMilitiaInFiveSectors( sDMapX, sDMapY ) / (FLOAT)NumEnemiesInFiveSectors( sDMapX, sDMapY ) ) );
00299       //    else 
00300       //          iDiff = iRes * ( (FLOAT)CountAllMilitiaInFiveSectors( sMapX, sMapY ) / DIV_OF_ORIGINAL_MILITIA / (FLOAT)NumEnemiesInFiveSectors( sDMapX, sDMapY ) );
00301 
00302             if( iDiff > (INT32)( (FLOAT)DIR_MIN_DIF * (FLOAT)iRes ) ) 
00303                   iRes = iDiff;
00304             else 
00305                   iRes = 0;
00306       }
00307 
00308 
00309 // There's player's mercs! Go there
00310       if( PlayerMercsInSector_MSE( (UINT8)sDMapX, (UINT8)sDMapY, FALSE ) )
00311             iRes += 15000;// should be enough
00312 
00313 //    ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"M %ld, E%ld,%ld %ld, Diff %ld", CountAllMilitiaInSector( sMapX, sMapY ), sDMapX, sDMapY, NumEnemiesInSector( sDMapX, sDMapY ), ((INT32)CountAllMilitiaInSector( sMapX, sMapY )) - ((INT32)NumEnemiesInSector( sDMapX, sDMapY )) );
00314 
00315       return iRes;
00316 }

00319 // Standard conditions the direction should fit
00320 BOOLEAN CheckStandardConditionsForDirection( INT16 sSMapX, INT16 sSMapY, INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, BOOLEAN fWithCities, BOOLEAN fForBattle, BOOLEAN fOnlyCitySectors )
00321 {
00322       UINT8 uiTravab = GetTraversability( SECTOR( sSMapX , sSMapY ) , SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) );
00323 
00324       if( uiTravab == GROUNDBARRIER || uiTravab == EDGEOFWORLD ) return FALSE;
00325 
00326       if( !fForBattle && gfMSBattle && NumEnemiesInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) ) return FALSE;
00327 
00328       return (GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == BLANK_SECTOR || fWithCities) && !IsThisSectorASAMSector(  sMapX, sMapY , 0 ) &&
00329             (GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR || !fOnlyCitySectors);// &&
00330 //          ( !NumEnemiesInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) || GetEnemyGroupIdInSector(sMapX, sMapY ) || fForBattle ) &&
00331 //          ( fForBattle || CountAllMilitiaInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) < gGameExternalOptions.guiMaxMilitiaSquadSize || PlayerMercsInSector( sMapX, sMapY, 0 ) )
00332 }

00334 void GenerateDirectionInfos( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT8* uiDirNumber, UINT16 pMoveDir[4][3], BOOLEAN fWithCities, BOOLEAN fForBattle, BOOLEAN fOnlyCitySectors )
00335 {
00336       *uiDirNumber = 0;
00337 
00338 #ifdef DEBUG_SHOW_RATINGS
00339       if( DEBUG_RATINGS_CONDITION )ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%ld,%ld-------------------", sMapX, sMapY );
00340 #endif
00341 
00342       if(CheckStandardConditionsForDirection( sMapX, sMapY, sMapX, sMapY - 1, fWithCities, fForBattle, fOnlyCitySectors ) )
00343       {
00344             pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][0] = SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY - 1 ); 
00345 
00346             if( fForBattle )
00347                   pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1] = 0;
00348             else
00349                   pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1] = CountDirectionRating( sMapX, sMapY, DIR_NORTH );
00350 
00351             pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][2] = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
00352 
00353 #ifdef DEBUG_SHOW_RATINGS
00354             if( DEBUG_RATINGS_CONDITION )ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Priority of north direction - %ld", pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1]);
00355 #endif
00356 
00357             ++(*uiDirNumber);
00358       }
00359       if(CheckStandardConditionsForDirection(  sMapX, sMapY, sMapX - 1, sMapY, fWithCities, fForBattle, fOnlyCitySectors ))
00360       {
00361             pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][0] = SECTOR( sMapX - 1, sMapY ); 
00362 
00363             if( fForBattle )
00364                   pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1] = 0;
00365             else
00366                   pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1] = CountDirectionRating( sMapX, sMapY, DIR_WEST );
00367 
00368             pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][2] = INSERTION_CODE_WEST;
00369 
00370 #ifdef DEBUG_SHOW_RATINGS
00371             if( DEBUG_RATINGS_CONDITION )ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Priority of west direction - %ld", pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1]);
00372 #endif
00373 
00374             ++(*uiDirNumber);
00375       }
00376       if(CheckStandardConditionsForDirection(  sMapX, sMapY, sMapX, sMapY + 1, fWithCities, fForBattle, fOnlyCitySectors ))
00377       {
00378             pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][0] = SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY + 1 ); 
00379             
00380             if( fForBattle )
00381                   pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1] = 0;
00382             else
00383                   pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1] = CountDirectionRating( sMapX, sMapY, DIR_SOUTH );
00384 
00385             pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][2] = INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH;
00386 
00387 #ifdef DEBUG_SHOW_RATINGS
00388             if( DEBUG_RATINGS_CONDITION )ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Priority of south direction - %ld", pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1]);
00389 #endif
00390 
00391             ++(*uiDirNumber);
00392       }
00393       if(CheckStandardConditionsForDirection(  sMapX, sMapY, sMapX + 1, sMapY, fWithCities, fForBattle, fOnlyCitySectors ))
00394       {
00395             pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][0] = SECTOR( sMapX + 1, sMapY ); 
00396             
00397             if( fForBattle )
00398                   pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1] = 0;
00399             else
00400                   pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1] = CountDirectionRating( sMapX, sMapY, DIR_EAST );
00401 
00402             pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][2] = INSERTION_CODE_EAST;
00403 
00404 #ifdef DEBUG_SHOW_RATINGS
00405             if( DEBUG_RATINGS_CONDITION )ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Priority of east direction - %ld", pMoveDir[ *uiDirNumber ][1]);
00406 #endif
00407 
00408             ++(*uiDirNumber);
00409       }
00410 
00411 }

00413 UINT8 pBlockMoveList[256];
00414 UINT8 uiBlockMoveListPointer;
00415 
00416 void AddToBlockMoveList(INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY)
00417 {
00418       pBlockMoveList[ uiBlockMoveListPointer++ ] = SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY );
00419 }
00420 
00421 void ClearBlockMoveList()
00422 {
00423       uiBlockMoveListPointer = 0;
00424 }
00425 
00426 BOOLEAN CheckInBlockMoveList(INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY)
00427 {
00428       UINT16 i;
00429       for( i = 0; i < uiBlockMoveListPointer ; ++i)
00430             if( sMapX == SECTORX(pBlockMoveList[i]) && sMapY == SECTORY(pBlockMoveList[i]) )return TRUE;
00431 
00432       return FALSE;
00433 }
00434 
00435 void UpdateMilitiaSquads(INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
00436 {
00437       UINT16 pMoveDir[4][3];
00438       UINT8 uiDirNumber = 0;
00439       UINT32 iRandomRes = 0, iRandom = 0;
00440       UINT8 x;//,y;
00441       SECTORINFO *pSectorInfo = &( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ] );
00442       UINT8 uiMilitiaCount;
00443 
00444       if( !gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowMilitiaGroups )
00445             return;
00446 
00447       if( sMapX == 1 && sMapY == 1 )
00448       {
00449             ClearBlockMoveList();
00450             gfMSBattle = FALSE;
00451       }
00452 
00453       if( CheckInBlockMoveList( sMapX, sMapY ) )return;
00454 
00455       uiMilitiaCount = CountMilitia(pSectorInfo);
00456       
00457       if( !uiMilitiaCount )return;
00458 
00459       // new squad
00460       if( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR )
00461       {
00462             if( GetWorldHour() % gGameExternalOptions.guiCreateEachNHours )return;
00463 
00464             GenerateDirectionInfos( sMapX, sMapY, &uiDirNumber, pMoveDir, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE );
00465 
00466             if(uiDirNumber)// && Random(100) < CHANCE_TO_GENERATE_A_SQUAD)
00467             {
00468                   for( x = 1; x < uiDirNumber ; ++x )pMoveDir[x][1] += pMoveDir[x-1][1];
00469 
00470                   iRandomRes = Random( pMoveDir[ uiDirNumber - 1 ][1] );
00471 
00472                   for( x = 0; x < uiDirNumber; ++x)
00473                         if( iRandomRes < pMoveDir[x][1] )
00474                         {
00475                               iRandomRes = x;
00476                               break;
00477                         }
00478                   
00479                   // shouldn't be!
00480                   if(iRandomRes >= uiDirNumber)iRandomRes = 0;
00481 
00482                   //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%ld,%ld:Dir count %ld, Rand %ld. Go to %ld,%ld", sMapX, sMapY, uiDirNumber, iRandomRes, SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ));
00483 
00484                   GenerateMilitiaSquad( sMapX, sMapY,  SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) );
00485                   AddToBlockMoveList( SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) );
00486                   
00487                   if( NumEnemiesInSector( SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) ) && CountAllMilitiaInSector( SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) ) )
00488                   {
00489 /*                      GROUP* pEnemyGroup = GetGroup( GetEnemyGroupIdInSector( SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) ) );
00490             
00491                         if(pEnemyGroup && pEnemyGroup->ubGroupID)
00492                         {
00493                               //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Attacking from %ld,%ld to %ld,%ld - enemy's group id %ld", sMapX, sMapY, SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0], pEnemyGroup->ubGroupID ));
00494                               //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Arrival 1, Arrival 2");
00495 
00496                               pEnemyGroup->ubPrevX = sMapX;
00497                               pEnemyGroup->ubPrevY = sMapY;
00498 
00499                               pEnemyGroup->ubNextX = SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] );
00500                               pEnemyGroup->ubNextY = SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] );
00501 */
00502                               gfMSBattle = TRUE;
00503 //                            GroupArrivedAtSector( pEnemyGroup->ubGroupID , TRUE, FALSE );
00504                               
00505                               EnterAutoResolveMode( SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ),  SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) );
00506 //                      }
00507                   }
00508 
00509             }
00510                   else return;
00511 
00512       }
00513       // moving squad, if it is not a SAM site
00514       else if(!IsThisSectorASAMSector(  sMapX, sMapY, 0 ))
00515             if( !PlayerMercsInSector_MSE( (UINT8)sMapX, (UINT8)sMapY, FALSE ) ) // and there's no player's mercs in the sector
00516       {
00517             if( GetWorldHour() % 2 )return;
00518 
00519             GenerateDirectionInfos( sMapX, sMapY, &uiDirNumber, pMoveDir, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE );
00520 
00521             if( uiDirNumber )
00522             {
00523                   for( x = 1; x < uiDirNumber ; ++x )pMoveDir[x][1] += pMoveDir[x-1][1];
00524             //                ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%ld,%ld", x, pMoveDir[x][1]);
00525                               
00526                   iRandom = Random( pMoveDir[ uiDirNumber - 1 ][1] + 
00527                         ( uiMilitiaCount >= gGameExternalOptions.guiMinMilitiaSquadSize ? CHANCE_TO_MOVE_A_SQUAD : CHANCE_TO_MOVE_AN_UNFULL_SQUAD ) );
00528 
00529                   //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Roll %ld", iRandomRes);
00530 
00531                   iRandomRes = 256;
00532 
00533                   for( x = 0; x < uiDirNumber; ++x)
00534                         if( iRandom < pMoveDir[x][1] )
00535                         {
00536                               iRandomRes = x;
00537                               break;
00538                         }
00539                   
00540                   // "Decided" to stay here
00541                   if(iRandomRes >= uiDirNumber)
00542                         return;
00543 
00544                   //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%ld,%ld:Dir count %ld, Rand %ld. Go to %ld,%ld. Have %ld militia men", sMapX, sMapY, uiDirNumber, iRandomRes, SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), uiMilitiaCount);
00545 
00546                   MoveMilitiaSquad( sMapX, sMapY,  SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), FALSE );
00547                   AddToBlockMoveList( SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) );
00548 
00549                   if ( gWorldSectorX == SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) && 
00550                           gWorldSectorY == SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) && 
00551                           !gbWorldSectorZ )
00552                   {
00553                         gfStrategicMilitiaChangesMade = TRUE;
00554                         ResetMilitia();
00555                   }
00556 
00557                   if( NumEnemiesInSector( SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) ) )
00558                   {
00559 /*                      GROUP* pEnemyGroup = GetGroup( GetEnemyGroupIdInSector( SECTORX( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ iRandomRes ][0] ) ) );

00562                         {

00572                               gfMSBattle = TRUE;

00577                   }
00578             }
00579                   else return;
00580       }
00581 
00582 }
00583 
00584 extern BOOLEAN gfMSResetMilitia;
00585 
00586 void DoMilitiaHelpFromAdjacentSectors( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
00587 {
00588       UINT16 pMoveDir[4][3];
00589       UINT8 uiDirNumber = 0;
00590       UINT8 x;
00591       UINT8 uiNumGreen = 0, uiNumReg = 0, uiNumElite = 0;
00592       SECTORINFO *pSectorInfo = &( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ] );
00593       BOOLEAN fMoreTroopsLeft[4] = {FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE};
00594       BOOLEAN fFirstLoop = TRUE;
00595       BOOLEAN fMilitiaAlreadyBeen = CountMilitia(pSectorInfo )>0 && gWorldSectorX == sMapX && gWorldSectorY == sMapY && gbWorldSectorZ == 0;
00596 
00597       guiDirNumber = 0;
00598 
00599       GenerateDirectionInfos( sMapX, sMapY, &uiDirNumber, pMoveDir, 
00600             ( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ? TRUE : FALSE ), TRUE, FALSE );
00601 
00602       ZeroMemory( gpAttackDirs, sizeof( gpAttackDirs ) );
00603 
00604       gpAttackDirs[ guiDirNumber ][0] = uiNumGreen = pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[GREEN_MILITIA];
00605       gpAttackDirs[ guiDirNumber ][1] = uiNumReg = pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[REGULAR_MILITIA];
00606       gpAttackDirs[ guiDirNumber ][2] = uiNumElite = pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ELITE_MILITIA];
00607       gpAttackDirs[ guiDirNumber ][3] = INSERTION_CODE_CENTER;
00608 
00609       guiDirNumber = uiDirNumber  + 1;
00610 
00611       x = 0;
00612       while( CountMilitia(pSectorInfo ) < gGameExternalOptions.guiMaxMilitiaSquadSizeBattle &&
00613             ( fMoreTroopsLeft[0] || fMoreTroopsLeft[1] || fMoreTroopsLeft[2] || fMoreTroopsLeft[3] || fFirstLoop ) )
00614       {
00615             fMoreTroopsLeft[ x ] = MoveOneBestMilitiaMan( SECTORX( pMoveDir[ x ][0] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ x ][0] ), sMapX, sMapY );
00616 
00617             if( fMilitiaAlreadyBeen )gfMSResetMilitia = TRUE;
00618 
00619             if( fMoreTroopsLeft[ x ] )
00620             {
00621                   gpAttackDirs[ x + 1 ][0] += pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[GREEN_MILITIA] - uiNumGreen;
00622                   gpAttackDirs[ x + 1 ][1] += pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[REGULAR_MILITIA] - uiNumReg;
00623                   gpAttackDirs[ x + 1 ][2] += pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ELITE_MILITIA] - uiNumElite;
00624                   gpAttackDirs[ x + 1 ][3] = (UINT8)pMoveDir[ x ][2];
00625                   
00626                   uiNumGreen = pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[GREEN_MILITIA];
00627                   uiNumReg = pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[REGULAR_MILITIA];
00628                   uiNumElite = pSectorInfo->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ELITE_MILITIA];
00629             }
00630 
00631             ++x;
00632             if( x >= uiDirNumber )
00633             {
00634                   x = 0;
00635                   fFirstLoop = FALSE;
00636             }
00637       }
00638 
00639 }
00640 
00641 void MSCallBack( UINT8 ubResult )
00642 {
00643       if( ubResult == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
00644             DoMilitiaHelpFromAdjacentSectors( sMSMapX,      sMSMapY );
00645 }
00646 
00647 BOOLEAN IsThereMilitiaInAdjacentSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
00648 {
00649       UINT16 pMoveDir[4][3];
00650       UINT8 uiDirNumber = 0;
00651       UINT8 x;
00652       BOOLEAN fResult = FALSE;
00653 
00654       GenerateDirectionInfos( sMapX, sMapY, &uiDirNumber, pMoveDir, 
00655             ( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ? TRUE : FALSE ), TRUE, FALSE );
00656 
00657       for( x = 0; x < uiDirNumber ; ++x )
00658             if( CountAllMilitiaInSector( SECTORX( pMoveDir[ x ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pMoveDir[ x ][ 0 ] ) ) )
00659                   fResult = TRUE;
00660 
00661       return fResult;
00662 }
00663 
00664 void MilitiaHelpFromAdjacentSectors( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
00665 {
00666       sMSMapX = sMapX;
00667       sMSMapY = sMapY;
00668 
00669       if( !gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowMilitiaGroups )
00670             return;
00671 
00672       if( CountAllMilitiaInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) ) MSCallBack( MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES );
00673 
00674       if( IsThereMilitiaInAdjacentSector( sMapX, sMapY ) && CountAllMilitiaInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) < gGameExternalOptions.guiMaxMilitiaSquadSizeBattle )
00675             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( gzCWStrings[0], MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, MSCallBack );
00676 }
00677 
00678 void MilitiaFollowPlayer( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT16 sDMapX, INT16 sDMapY )
00679 {
00680       if( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ||
00681              IsThisSectorASAMSector( sMapX, sMapY, 0 ) ||
00682              PlayerMercsInSector_MSE( (UINT8)sMapX, (UINT8)sMapY, TRUE ) )return;
00683 
00684       if( GetTownIdForSector( sDMapX, sDMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ||
00685              IsThisSectorASAMSector( sDMapX, sDMapY, 0 ) )return;
00686 
00687 
00688       MoveMilitiaSquad( sMapX, sMapY, sDMapX, sDMapY, FALSE );
00689 }
